name: Combo Jumper
description: Combo Jumper is a first person platformer. You gain a combo point every time you wall jump, your collected combo points multiply your launch velocity, giving you the ability to leap further. Jump through 8 unique levels and different challenges for many hours of entertainment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-7640X @ 4.00GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K @ 4.00GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1300 MB available space
